creditline: Gift of David L. Parker and Mary M.D. Parker
inscription:
Inscribed in graphite LC: Working Proof--Vermillion

Inscribed in black ink on mat, verso: She always thought she was wrong
medium: Pastel over lithograph (key plate), working proof
provenance: [Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis, sold to Parker]; David and Mary Parker, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1997.
title: She Always Thought She Was Wrong
